name: FlowAccount Co. Ltd.
description: Developer of a cloud-based accounting platform designed to track payments and invoices. The company's platform features the ability to create and send professional invoices, track payments and transactions, open bills, share documents, and more, enabling enterprises to effectively manage their businesses and accounting process.
one_liner: Developer of a cloud-based accounting platform designed to track payments and invoices. The company's platform features the ability to create and send professional invoices, track payments and transactions, open bills, share documents, and more, enabling enterprises to effectively manage their businesses and accounting process.
